price: Wọn kò níí bi (Allāhu) ní ìbéèrè nípa n̄ǹkan tí Ó ń ṣe. Àwọn ni wọ́n máa bi ní ìbéèrè (nípa iṣẹ́ ọwọ́ wọn).
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
